Title: Mickey 17
Description: An 'expendable' clone on an interstellar mission discovers the dark secrets behind his repeated deaths and resurrections.

Title: Dark Winds
Description: A psychological thriller set in the 1970s Southwest, following two Navajo police officers investigating a double murder.

Title: The Electric State
Description: In a dystopian future, a young girl and her robot companion embark on a journey across America to find her missing brother.
